data.name: Floor is...What!?
data.detailed_description:
Floor is...What!?

Get ready to be thrown into fast paced mini game mayhem where you and your friends will play as toy bobbleheads and try to destroy each other with bizarre obstacles like the chonky sweeper, swarming sharks, and lava floors! Stack up wins in free play mode or battle in tournament mode with themed stages to earn coins to trade in for new bobblehead characters!

Themed Games

Floor is...What!? doesn't just mean floor is lava! Experience 50+ games set in the snow filled frozen tundra, quicksand trapped desert dunes, hungry shark infested waters, low gravity moon base, and more! You may find yourself battling in an underground dungeon trying to avoid lava floors in one game but having a snowball fight during a blizzard with a bunch of yetis in the next!

Hilariously Customizable

Unlockable characters and accessories let you customize the look of your character without needing to spend your hard earned money on DLC. Everything is unlocked by playing the game. Play as a scarecrow wearing a space marine helmet or beat your friends as a witch wearing a santa hat! The more you play the more options you unlock!

Accessible Gameplay

Whether its a playing preference or an accessibility requirement to play a game, we have options for you! We go deeper than ensuring all game modes require less than two buttons to play and being able to use the dpad to navigate menus. You can also disable features like motion blur, screen shake, and speed up camera smoothing to help with motion sickness. We also have options for a dyslexic friendly font, in-game UI scaling (not just text size!), and slowing down game speed.

data.short_description: Experience 4 player bobbleheaded toy mayhem with 50+ mini games across themed worlds like lava, space, and more! Use your winnings to collect all the characters and unlock customizable parts!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86 32 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
